title: Rock into Me
description: NOTE: THIS TITLE IS NO LONGER AVAILABLESpicy Rock Romance Within Nashville's music scene, the week-long battle of the bands is fierce and cut-throat as well as a time to party hard. Orion, a five-member band gaining momentum, catches the eye of Jonathan Lansing, producer and CEO of Lansing Records on Music Row. He creates stars out of those he represents... As a hardnose record producer for some of the hottest bands, Lansing is accustomed to pushing boundaries unmercifully. She's the one to call his bluff...When Alana St. James, the provocative lead singer of Orion, walks out on stage, everyone's attention is riveted. In turn, she notices the gorgeous man seated directly in front of her, with his brooding intensity saturating the space around him.After Orion's performance, Alana and Lansing connect with a wrecking-ball force, detonating into a fiery attraction. It'll take a wild encounter and a bombshell of a woman to bring him to his knees...Lansing breaks his ironclad rule of zero client hook-ups. For one night, they discover an irresistible affair that rocks their worlds. RULE BREAKER series.Sex, Love & Lies in Music CityCrash & Burn is the next installment...shattering walls soon!
author: Susan Arden
